required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Acute Metabolic and Endocrine Responses of Glucose and Fructose in Healthy Young Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Acute Metabolic and Endocrine Responses of Glucose and Fructose in Healthy Young Subjects: A Double-blinded, Randomized, Crossover Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the metabolic and endocrine responses during 3 hour after taking 75g fructose or glucose in young Chinese.

detailed_description.textblock: The study was a double-blinded, randomized, crossover trial. Twenty healthy volunteers were randomized to two groups: group A (300ml of 22.5% glucose) and group B (300ml of 22.5% fructose).Volunteer was randomized into either group A or B, after an 8-h overnight fasting, took 300ml of solution at 0830 within 5 minutes. After one-week washout period, volunteer was crossed over for either group B or A. each intervention, venous blood was collected at 0h, 0.5h, 1h, 2h, and 3h and blood pressure was tested at 0h, 1h, 2h, and 3h.

primary_outcome.description: Serum uric acid concentration was analyzed on HITACHI 7020 chemistry analyzer using enzyme-based colorimetric test or colorimetric test supplied by DiaSys Diagnostic Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd

secondary_outcome.description: Blood pressure was measured at Zhejiang University Hospital by the research workers who were blind to the groups within 3 hours blood collection.

other_outcome.description: Serum glucose level was analyzed on HITACHI 7020 chemistry analyzer using enzyme-based colorimetric test or colorimetric test supplied by Diasys Diagnostic Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd
Serum nitric oxide concentration was measured using NO assay kit (Nanjing Jiancheng Technology Co., Lte., Nanjing, China) by the research workers who were blind to the groups.
Enzymatic activity of aldose reductase in serum was measured using ELISA kit (Shanghai Changjin Biology Co., Lte., Shanghai, China ) by the research workers who were blind to the groups.
Enzymatic activity of phosphofructokinase in serum was measured using ELISA kit (Shanghai Changjin Biology Co., Lte., Shanghai, China ) by the research workers who were blind to the groups .
Serum insulin concentration was analyzed on HITACHI 7020 chemistry analyzer using enzyme-based colorimetric test or colorimetric test supplied by Diasys Diagnostic Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd
Serum insulin-c concentration was analyzed on HITACHI 7020 chemistry analyzer using enzyme-based colorimetric test or colorimetric test supplied by Diasys Diagnostic Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd
Triglyceride concentration in serum was analyzed on HITACHI 7020 chemistry analyzer using enzyme-based colorimetric test or colorimetric test supplied by Diasys Diagnostic Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd
Total cholesterol concentration was analyzed on HITACHI 7020 chemistry analyzer using enzyme-based colorimetric test or colorimetric test supplied by Diasys Diagnostic Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd
High-density cholesterol was analyzed on HITACHI 7020 chemistry analyzer using enzyme-based colorimetric test or colorimetric test supplied by Diasys Diagnostic Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd.

Low-density cholesterol concentration was analyzed on HITACHI 7020 chemistry analyzer using enzyme-based colorimetric test or colorimetric test supplied by Diasys Diagnostic Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd.

Enzymatic activity of lactate dehydrogenase was analyzed on HITACHI 7020 chemistry analyzer using enzyme-based colorimetric test or colorimetric test supplied by Diasys Diagnostic Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd.

arm_group.description: Volunteer was randomized into either group fructose or glucose
After one-week washout period, volunteer was crossed over for either group glucose or fructose.

intervention.description: 75g fructose is dissolved in 300 ml water.After overnight fasting, 300ml of solution at 0830 within 5 minutes is taken by volunteers
75g glucose is dissolved in 300 ml water.After overnight fasting, 300ml of solution at 0830 within 5 minutes is taken by volunteers

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Inclusion criteria were aged 19-39 years, with BMI between 18-24 kg/m 2.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects pregnant or having a history of hepatic or renal disease, fructose intolerance, gout, hypoglycemia, or diabetes mellitus were excluded.
- Subjects taking any drugs, botanicals, or nutraceutical known to influence blood pressure also were rejected either.

overall_official.affiliation: College of Biosystem Engineering & Food Science, Zhejiang University

reference.citation: Fulgoni V 3rd. High-fructose corn syrup: everything you wanted to know, but were afraid to ask. Am J Clin Nutr. 2008 Dec;88(6):1715S. doi: 10.3945/ajcn.2008.25825A.

Le MT, Frye RF, Rivard CJ, Cheng J, McFann KK, Segal MS, Johnson RJ, Johnson JA. Effects of high-fructose corn syrup and sucrose on the pharmacokinetics of fructose and acute metabolic and hemodynamic responses in healthy subjects. Metabolism. 2012 May;61(5):641-51. doi: 10.1016/j.metabol.2011.09.013. Epub 2011 Dec 5.
